articles.author: Áine Ryan
articles.title: ‘Luckily, he is oblivious to the coronavirus crisis’: Daddy, dementia and me

articles.author: Peter Goff
articles.title: Coronavirus: China reveals just eight new cases amid row with US
articles.description: China now has almost 81,000 confirmed cases but 64,000 patients have recovered
articles.content:
New cases of coronavirus in China dropped to single digits for the first time since the country began daily reporting in January, as a war of words over the handling of the outbreak intensified and Beijing accused the US of China-bashing.
